title: New Edition’s Neighborhood Secret
itunes:title: New Edition’s Neighborhood Secret
description: The boys in New Edition were basketball fans from Boston - Celtics country. So what happened when they hung out with the L.A. Lakers in a music video during the height of the 1980s Celtics/Lakers rivalry?
